topic.title: Viewing a Process in a Queue

body.section: To view a process in a queue, click on a process row in the list. For exam­ple, click on the “Break Password” process and the process will display below the queue reading area. To “hide” the queue list so you can view the entire process diagram, click on the up arrow above the diagram area. The screen will look like the one shown in .
You can also use the entire window to display and view a process by click­ing on the left-facing arrow next to the Queue Name heading as shown in .
